name: tm08
effect: Teaches Bulk Up to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Bulk Up to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Rock Smash Gen I: Body Slam)

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body, boosting both its Attack and Defense stats.
flavor_text.platinum: The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body, boosting both its Attack and Defense stats.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body, boosting both its Attack and Defense stats.
